cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heikai

sentence.kanji: 会長が閉会の挨拶をしました。

sentence.english: The chairman gave the closing greetings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nodo

sentence.kanji: 風邪をひいて喉が痛いです。
sentence.romaji: kaze wo hiite nodo ga itai desu
sentence.english: I caught a cold and have a sore throat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoi

sentence.kanji: このかばんは重いです。
sentence.romaji: kono kaban ha omoi desu

sentence.english: He runs fast.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omosa

sentence.english: Please weigh this luggage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doubutsu

sentence.kanji: 私は動物が大好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha doubutsu ga daisuki desu
sentence.english: I love animals.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sokutatsu

sentence.english: I want to send this by express delivery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juuyou

sentence.kanji: これは重要な書類です。

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shurui

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fudousanya

sentence.romaji: watashi no chichi ha fudousanya desu
sentence.english: My father's a real estate agent.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's undou

sentence.kanji: 彼はもっと運動した方がいい。
sentence.romaji: kare ha moto undou shita hou ga ii
sentence.english: He should exercise more.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanomu

sentence.romaji: watashi ha hanba-ga- wo tanomimashita
sentence.english: I ordered a hamburger.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ugokasu

sentence.kanji: 部屋の家具を動かしました。
sentence.romaji: heya no kagu wo ugokashimashita
sentence.english: I moved the furniture in the room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doubutsuen

sentence.kanji: 昨日子供たちと動物園に行きました。
sentence.romaji: kinou kodomotachi to doubutsuen ni ikimashita
sentence.english: I went to the zoo with my kids yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ugoki

sentence.kanji: まず相手の動きを見ましょう。

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jidousha

sentence.english: He got a job at a car company.

sentence.english: I keep my promises.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuukanshi

sentence.english: Let's play soccer in the playing field.
